channel.title: Attack someone
channel.description:
I was wondering how to make a specific area attackable
say i wanted in castlewars to be able to attack anyone, just that square from one side to the other side, i was messing with PK boundries and the only thing i could get it to is make it so that from the castlewars up the wild, i figured out how to make it so that a lvl 3 can attack a lvl 172 but i cant get it for just that small area in castlewars.
ive changed the whole castlewars code so that it works just about 100%, just that i cant get it to be able to attack each other

item.title: Attack someone
item.dc:creator: @drugofanewage drugofanewage
item.description:
@drugofanewage wrote:

if your using testscape search for

checkwildy2();

underneath it you’ll see

WildyLevel = (((absY - 3512) / 8) + 1);

/ 8 means that every 8 steps forward and +1 means that it adds 1 to the wildy level

so if you change / 8 to /1 and +1 to +100 then every step you take will add 100 levels to the wild. Simply said as long as your 2 steps in the wild you can attack anyone… you can also mess with these a little bit

but as for main question anyone got any anwsers

PS.im only telling you this because i had no problem with you… but your friend on cowscape is a faggot

Read full topic
